xmlmc

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • xmlmc.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    xmlmc.Connection.java

    Handles the maintanance of a network connection to the server. This includes sending requests, parsing responses, updating the session cookie and closing the connection. This class is package local and is not accessible outside of the xmlmc package. To take advantage of the xmlmc.Connection class, use the XmlMethodCall class instead.
